00021 #ifndef HALSTEADVISITOR_H
00022 #define HALSTEADVISITOR_H
00023 
00028 #include "Visitor.h"
00029 
00038 class HalsteadVisitor : public Visitor
00039 {
00040   public:
00041      HalsteadVisitor() : operatorCount(0), operandCount(0) { }
00043      void reInit() { operatorCount = operandCount = 0; }
00045      int getOperatorCount() const { return operatorCount; }
00047      int getOperandCount() const { return operandCount; }
00048 
00049      void visitUnion(RightPart *rp1, RightPart *rp2) 
00050        { operatorCount++; rp1->accept(this); rp2->accept(this); }
00051      void visitConcat(RightPart *rp1, RightPart *rp2) 
00052        { operatorCount++; rp1->accept(this); rp2->accept(this); }
00053      void visitKleeneClosure(RightPart *rp) 
00054        { operatorCount++; rp->accept(this); }
00055      void visitPositiveClosure(RightPart *rp) 
00056        { operatorCount++; rp->accept(this); }
00057      void visitOption(RightPart *rp) 
00058        { operatorCount++; rp->accept(this); }
00060      void visitTerminal(Terminal *) { operandCount++; }
00062      void visitNonTerminal(NonTerminal *nterm) { operandCount++; }
00064      void visitEmpty() { operatorCount++; }  // or operandCount++ ???
00065 
00066  private:
00068     int operatorCount;
00070     int operandCount;
00071 
00072 };
00073 
00074 #endif
